title: COVID-19 Misconceptions - FactCheck.org
description: SciCheck's COVID-19/Vaccination Project is made possible by a grant from the Robert Wood Johnson Foundation. The foundation has no control over our editorial decisions, and the views expressed here do not necessarily reflect the views of the foundation. The goal is to increase exposure to accurate information about COVID-19 and vaccines, while decreasing the impact of misinformation. On this page, you'll find answers to commonly asked questions, as well as links to our articles debunking misinformation.
cleaned_text: COVID-19 Misconceptions This content is available in both English and Español SciCheck's COVID-19/Vaccination Project is made possible by a grant from the Robert Wood Johnson Foundation. The foundation has [no control](https://www.factcheck.org/2021/04/scicheck-and-our-committment-to-transparency/) over our editorial decisions, and the views expressed here do not necessarily reflect the views of the foundation. The goal is to increase exposure to accurate information about COVID-19 and vaccines, while decreasing the impact of misinformation. On this page, you'll find answers to commonly asked questions, as well as links to our articles debunking misinformation. All of our COVID-19 stories can be found [here](https://www.factcheck.org/issue/coronavirus/).
